Class BoundedEnv

  SquareEnvironment
      BoundedEnv
All Implemented Interfaces:
Environment
public class BoundedEnv
extends SquareEnvironment

Dean Attali
March 10, 2006

This class is a modified version of the BoundedEnv from the Marine Biologist Simulation

Version:
1 March 2006
Author:
Dean Attali
